name: Bone Diggity
description:
A game created for Advanced Game Development(CST426), game idea by Turtleninisoup.

Controls:

Q = Shovel
W = Tongs

Click with tongs and drag to collection crate to get points!

Credits: 

Team Leader/Menu Designer/Programmer:  Turtleninisoup 

Lead Art Designer: Foreverowlone

Lead Sound Designer/Programmer: JerecDev 

Lead Programmer/Level Designer: Xenvex(Me)
